search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for GatherUp (gatherup.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for GatherUp is: [https://gatherup.com/pricing/](https://gatherup.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

The Features You Need. The Pricing You Want.
============================================

Speak with a product expert to understand all our platform benefits, and experience them for yourself with a 14-day trial.  
  
Are you a digital marketing agency looking for solutions? Connect with us for white label options and our agency pricing plans.

[Start Your Free Trial](https://app.gatherup.com/trial?__hstc=260711634.d2278d20f2fcb98f91e19c560d460ea8.1709587651716.1712643905877.1712675384173.10&__hssc=260711634.204.1712675384173&__hsfp=754967255&_gl=1*gdpn31*_gcl_au*NDYxODE3NTgwLjE3MDk1ODc2NTA.)

![Image 3: Illustration of various dashboard widgets on computer monitor](https://gatherup.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/features.svg)

Simple, Affordable Pricing
--------------------------

![Image 4: Storefront icon](https://gatherup.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/small-business.svg)

Small Business
--------------

1 Location

$99
---

/month

[Free 14-Day Trial](https://app.gatherup.com/trial)

[Learn more](https://gatherup.com/how-it-works/small-business/)

![Image 5: Multi location icon](https://gatherup.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/multi-location.svg)

Multi Location
--------------

2-10 locations

*   2-10 locations
*   11-16 locations
*   17-25 locations
*   26-40 locations
*   41-100 locations
*   101+ locations

$60
---

/month  
 per location

[Free 14-Day Trial](https://app.gatherup.com/trial)

[Learn more](https://gatherup.com/how-it-works/multi-location/)

![Image 6: Agency icon](https://gatherup.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/agency.svg)

Agency
------

*   White label reputation management software for your clients
*   Add reputation management, review acquisition and customer experience to your offering today

[Learn More](https://gatherup.com/how-it-works/digital-agencies/)

All Plans Include
-----------------

*   Up to 300 SMS + 3,000 email credits per location per month
*   Online review monitoring 100+ sites
*   Net Promoter Score and surveys
*   Multiple feedback and review options
*   QR codes and custom feedback links

*   Customer upload integrations
*   API, Zapier and Webhooks
*   Full reporting suite
*   Custom notifications
*   Unique AI-crafted replies

*   In-app review responding
*   Review widgets and badge
*   AI-driven topic and keyword tagging
*   Conversion Pop-Up
*   Automated social sharing

Add Ons
-------

Campaigns, promotional SMS marketing
------------------------------------

$10
---

/month  
 per location

*   Enjoy 1,000 promotional SMS messages per month per location. Additional promotional SMS messages are $0.02 per message.
*   Build a compliant list of your happiest customers using 1st party review data
*   Drive loyalty and retention by texting exclusive offers and information to your subscribers

[Learn More](https://gatherup.com/sms/)

Web-to-Text Chat
----------------

$10
---

/month  
 per location

*   2-way Web-to-SMS feature
*   Engage with leads and customers faster than ever by turning a webchat into a 2-way SMS conversation
*   Simply place our widget on the website and turn website visitors into customers
*   Conversations can be managed and assigned within your dashboard

[Learn More](https://gatherup.com/features/#web-to-chat)

Customer Contact Software Integrations
--------------------------------------

The most common integration with GatherUp is to allow your CRM, POS, or other customer contact software to sync with our service to automatically request feedback. Easily connect your app’s account and list using one click integrations.

[Learn more about integrations](https://gatherup.com/integrations/)

![Image 7: Illustration of software integrations](blob:http://localhost/322256b1a078b13788bc103f508d0bbf)

Request and Monitor Hundreds of Review Sites
--------------------------------------------

![Image 9: Google logo](blob:http://localhost/322256b1a078b13788bc103f508d0bbf)

![Image 11: facebook logo](blob:http://localhost/322256b1a078b13788bc103f508d0bbf)

![Image 13: YP logo](blob:http://localhost/322256b1a078b13788bc103f508d0bbf)

![Image 15: WebMD logo](blob:http://localhost/322256b1a078b13788bc103f508d0bbf)

![Image 17: Avvo logo](blob:http://localhost/322256b1a078b13788bc103f508d0bbf)

Gather feedback and reviews to drive your business up
-----------------------------------------------------

GatherUp will make customer experience the backbone of your business, building a continuous cycle of happy customers and powerful reviews to help you capture your next customer.

[Start Free Trial](https://app.gatherup.com/trial)
